dcterms:description: Ponglantis is a modified version of the Atari game Pong, where the reward scale increases significantly after scoring 10 points, transitioning to a phase with much larger rewards.
dcterms:title: Ponglantis

dcterms:description: Exponential Pong is a variant of the game Pong where the rewards are exponentially scaled based on the player's current score, specifically multiplied by 2 raised to the power of the score.
dcterms:title: Exponential Pong

dcterms:description: The Atari Games dataset includes various games such as Video Pinball, Bowling, Centipede, Ms. Pacman, Chopper Command, and Fishing Derby, used to evaluate reinforcement learning algorithms.
dcterms:title: Atari Games
